content.intro: Will soroban help with school math? It's the question every parent asks before committing. Here's the honest, nuanced answer.

sections.text: Yes, soroban can help school math – but indirectly. It builds foundational skills that make ALL math easier, rather than directly teaching school curriculum.

items: **Faster calculation:** Frees up mental energy for problem-solving
**Better number sense:** Understanding how numbers work together
**Improved focus:** Attention and concentration transfer to all subjects
**Math confidence:** Success builds willingness to tackle hard problems
**Working memory:** Holding numbers mentally helps with multi-step problems

sections.text: Multiple studies have found that abacus training:

sections.text: The earlier you start, the more school math benefits. Starting in 1st grade gives years of compound improvement before math gets really hard.

faq.question: Will soroban guarantee better grades?
faq.answer: No guarantees. It builds skills that SHOULD help grades, but grades depend on many factors beyond calculation speed.

faq.question: How long until I see school improvement?
faq.answer: Typically 6-12 months of consistent practice. Some families see changes sooner; others take longer.

faq.question: Should I do soroban instead of math tutoring?
faq.answer: They serve different purposes. Tutoring addresses current curriculum; soroban builds foundational skills. Both together can be powerful.
